name: Fire Truck
description: Drive a fire truck to rescue people and put out fires in this exciting game.

name: Jelly Truck
description: Navigate a jelly truck through wobbly terrains and complete fun challenges.

name: Racing Monster Trucks
description: Race monster trucks through challenging tracks and perform stunts in this thrilling game.

name: Truck Trials
description: Test your driving skills through obstacle courses in this challenging truck game.

name: Word Slide
description: Slide letters to form words in this engaging and educational puzzle game.

name: Alien Attack
description: You're a space trooper left alone by accident. Surrounded by aliens, fight them off using five weapons looted from bosses. Features hardcore gameplay, retro - style pixel - art graphics and chip sounds, and split - screen co - op.

name: Galaga Assault
description: A modern take on the classic Galaga. In redemption mode, shoot enemy ships to earn tickets and face a boss for more. Players can add up to 12 ships for more firepower. Also has an amusement mode like the old - school Galaga with new features.

name: Galaxy Attack
description: Take control of a spaceship to protect Earth from alien swarms. Face increasing numbers of enemies in hazardous environments. Upgrade your spacecraft, collect items, and engage in multiplayer battles across 140 + levels.

name: Galaxy War
description: In this 1979 arcade shoot - em - up, guide missiles upwards to destroy horizontally - scrolling alien invaders. Avoid asteroids and enemy projectiles. Later adapted for Super Famicom with different graphical modes.

name: Ball Sort Puzzle
description: Arrange balls of different colors into matching tubes. Use logic and planning to move balls around and complete each sorting level.

name: Hexagon Block Sort
description: Sort hexagonal blocks based on specific criteria, like color or shape. Fit the blocks into the correct positions on a hexagonal grid.

name: Market Sort
description: Sort items in a market setting. Maybe organize products on shelves or group them by category to keep the market in order.

name: Good Sort Master War
description: Sort goods in a war - themed scenario. Perhaps organize supplies for an army or categorize items in a war - torn market.

name: Ball Sort Master
description: Master the art of ball sorting. Move balls of various colors into their respective holes or containers in an increasingly difficult series of levels.

name: Cocktail Sort
description: Based on the sorting algorithm, arrange objects in a specific order. It might use a two - way sorting approach, similar to the cocktail shaker sort algorithm.

name: Star Boom
description: Pop stars to clear levels. Match or burst stars in patterns to trigger chain reactions and progress through the game.

name: Zoo Boom
description: Pop balloons or objects in a zoo - themed setting. Use power - ups to clear areas filled with zoo - related items.

name: Puppy Blast
description: Blast puppy - related objects. Use power - ups to clear areas filled with puppy - themed items and progress through levels.

name: Power Pop Blast
description: Pop objects using power - ups. Combine different power - ups to create chain reactions and clear levels more efficiently.

name: Merge Tanks
description: Merge tanks to create more powerful ones. Combine tanks of the same type to level them up and build a stronger army.

name: Merge Gun Elite Shooting
description: Merge guns to enhance shooting power. Combine different guns to create more advanced and powerful weapons for shooting enemies.

name: Stick Merge
description: Merge stick - figures or stick - related items. Combine them to create more complex structures or characters.

name: merge-heroes-fix
description: Merge heroes to strengthen them. Combine different heroes to unlock new abilities and powers for battles.

name: Find_Difference_2024
description: Spot differences between two similar images. Hunt for subtle changes in a variety of 2024 - themed pictures.

name: Find_500_Difference
description: Discover 500 differences across pairs of images. Test your observation skills with a large number of challenging image pairs.

name: Find_Differences
description: Identify differences between two pictures. Sharpen your eyesight by looking for small details that set the images apart.

name: Candy Blast
description: Blast candies to clear levels. Use power - ups to create explosions and eliminate groups of candies.

name: Kitty_Jewel_Quest
description: Embark on a jewel quest with a kitty. Help the kitty find jewels in various levels filled with obstacles.

name: Parking_Fury
description: Park cars in a challenging environment. Maneuver vehicles into tight parking spaces while avoiding collisions.

name: Bus_Parking_King
description: Become the king of bus parking. Park buses in different parking lots, dealing with tricky angles and limited space.

name: crazy_parking
description: Engage in crazy parking scenarios. Park cars in odd - shaped lots or under time pressure.

name: Move The Car
description: Move cars to their designated spots. Rearrange vehicles in a parking lot or garage to make space.

name: Parking_Ace_3d
description: Ace parking in a 3D environment. Park vehicles in detailed 3D parking lots with precision.

name: ParkingOut
description: Parking cars out of difficult situations. Get cars out of tight spots or crowded areas.

name: Pocket_Parking
description: Park in a pocket - sized parking area. Use touch controls to park vehicles in small, challenging spaces.

name: parkmania
description: Experience parking mania. Park a variety of vehicles in different, often chaotic, parking scenarios.

name: Draw The Defense
description: Draw defenses to protect your base. Create walls, barriers, or traps by drawing on the screen.

name: Defender Master1
description: Master the art of defense. Defeat waves of enemies by placing and upgrading defensive structures.

name: towerDefense
description: Play a classic tower - defense game. Place towers along paths to stop waves of enemies from reaching your base.

name: Music_Line_3D
description: Interact with music in a 3D line - based game. Follow the music rhythm by tapping or swiping on 3D lines.

name: Pinao_Keys
description: Press piano keys to play music. Use the in - game piano keys to create beautiful tunes.

name: Perfect_Piano_2
description: Play the piano perfectly. Use the virtual piano to practice and play a variety of songs.

name: onet-paradise
description: In this paradise - themed onet game, match pairs of tiles to clear the board. Enjoy beautiful visuals and relaxing gameplay as you work through levels.

name: onet-fruit-classic
description: Play the classic onet game with a fruit twist. Match fruit - shaped tiles to clear the screen, and test your matching speed and skills.

name: onet-world
description: Explore the onet world. Match tiles across different maps and scenarios, and unlock new levels and challenges as you go.

name: blockup-puzzle
description: Arrange blocks to solve puzzles. Stack and fit blocks in the right places, and clear levels by meeting specific block - arrangement goals.

name: fruits-slot-machine
description: Spin the slot machine with fruit symbols. Try your luck to get winning combinations of fruits and win big in this classic - style slot game.

name: quiz-star
description: Test your knowledge in a quiz show. Answer a variety of questions across different topics, and aim to become the quiz star.

name: tetra-blocks
description: Arrange falling tetra - shaped blocks. Create complete lines to clear them and avoid filling up the board in this addictive block - stacking game.

name: two-dots-remastered
description: Connect two dots of the same color. Solve puzzles, create chains, and enjoy the remastered version of this popular dot - connecting game.

name: bubble-up-endless
description: Pop bubbles non - stop in an endless mode. Shoot bubbles, create large combos, and see how high of a score you can achieve in this never - ending bubble - shooting experience.

name: word-haven
description: Explore a world of words. Solve word puzzles, find hidden words, and expand your vocabulary in this word - based adventure game.

name: sport-challenge
description: Take on various sports challenges. Compete in different sports events, test your athletic skills, and strive for victory in this sports - themed game.

name: word-clues
description: Find words using clues. Solve word puzzles, think logically, and discover the right words based on the given hints in this engaging word game.

name: kids-coloring
description: Let kids unleash their creativity. Color in various pictures, choose different colors, and have a blast in this kid - friendly coloring game.

name: world-puzzle
description: Solve puzzles from around the world. Encounter different puzzle types, test your problem - solving skills, and explore the global puzzle landscape.

name: Basketball_Crazy
description: Get crazy about basketball! Shoot hoops, perform dunks, and compete in exciting basketball games with wild and unpredictable gameplay.

name: basketball-legends-2020
description: Play with basketball legends from 2020. Team up with iconic players, showcase your skills, and compete in high - profile basketball tournaments.

name: La_Football
description: Dive into the world of football. Manage your team, train players, and compete in leagues to become the football champion in this engaging game.

name: FootballKick3D
description: Kick footballs in a 3D environment. Aim for the goal, adjust your kick power and angle, and score goals in this realistic 3D football - kicking game.

name: scooer_hero
description: Become a scooter hero. Ride your scooter through the city, perform tricks, and complete missions in this action - packed scooter - riding game.

name: basket-swooshes
description: Make the perfect basketball shots. Aim for the net, hear the swooshes, and score points in this simple yet addictive basketball - shooting game.

name: subway_surfers_rio
description: Surf through the streets of Rio. Run from the cops, dodge obstacles, and collect coins in this subway - surfing adventure set in the vibrant city of Rio.

name: Papa Cherry Saga
description: Match colorful candies and complete sweet challenges in this fun, match-3 puzzle game.

name: 1010 Color Match
description: Match colors and shapes in this addictive puzzle game.

name: Ball Sort Puzzle
description: Sort colored balls into tubes in this relaxing and satisfying puzzle game.

name: Bod The Robber 2
description: Help Bod steal treasures while avoiding traps and guards in this stealth game.

name: Fireboy & Watergirl 3
description: Team up to solve puzzles in this cooperative adventure game.

name: Fireboy & Watergirl 4
description: Cooperate with Fireboy and Watergirl to solve puzzles in this exciting adventure.

name: Fireboy & Watergirl 5
description: Team up to navigate new challenges and overcome obstacles together.

name: Fireboy & Watergirl 6
description: Explore new worlds and solve intricate puzzles with both characters.

name: Fireboy & Watergirl
description: Guide Fireboy and Watergirl through challenging levels using their unique abilities.

name: OvO
description: Jump and dash through levels filled with obstacles in this fast-paced platformer.

name: Pacman HTML5
description: Navigate mazes, eat pellets, and avoid ghosts in this classic arcade game.

name: Save The Doge
description: Protect Doge from obstacles and collect coins in this fun adventure.

name: Snail Bob 3
description: Help Snail Bob on his new adventure filled with puzzles and fun.

name: Snail Bob 4
description: Help Snail Bob navigate through tricky puzzles and obstacles in this fun adventure.

name: Leaping over Obstacles
description: Leaping over Obstacles is a sports game. Players need to bravely leap over various obstacles.

name: Surfing
description: Surfing is a game that allows players, especially girls, to experience the excitement of riding the waves, performing tricks and competing in virtual surfing competitions.

name: The Clumsy Family
description: The Clumsy Family is a game designed for kids, where they can interact with a clumsy but lovable family, participating in various fun and light-hearted activities.

name: alinking verb
description: In this sports game, players use specific linking verbs to connect different sports actions and complete challenging tasks.

name: games-gh-pages
description: This game offers a variety of fun activities for girls where they can create their own stories, dress up characters, and have a great time in a virtual world.

name: geometriko
description: Players engage in a geometric-themed sports game where they use shapes and patterns to complete challenges and win in different sports competitions.

name: norman-the-necromancer
description: Kids can experience a magical world in this game as they follow the adventures of Norman, the young necromancer, learning about spells and friendship.
